titleStmt.title: Joseph Lathrop to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG2000

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives

creation.placeName: St. Louis, St. Louis County, Missouri

body.p:
COLLECTION DEPARTMENT,
ASSOCIATED OFFICES
IN UNITED STATES,
NEW YORK,
BOSTON,
PHILADELPHIA,
BALTIMORE,
CHICAGO,
CINCINNATI,
DETROIT.
IN ENGLAND
LONDON,
MANCHESTER,
LIVERPOOL.
IN SCOTLAND
GLADGOW,
EDINBURGH.
ESTABLISHED IN
1842.

The Commercial Agency,
N. E. CORNER SECOND 7 PINE STS
St. Louis, Dec. 9th 1864
To his Excellency,
Governor Bramlett.
Frankfort, Ky.
Respected Sir,

If consistent with your feelings and existing appointments, I desire to be appointed a "Commissioner of Deeds" for your State, for Missouri. I enclose commendatory letter from our present member of Congress & his associate in the practice of his profession. If no objection to the appointment, and your Secretary will state to me the pre-requisites, I will endeavor to comply with them; and also, be very much obliged to your.

Comr of Deeds
Missouri
Joseph Lathrop
apptd
13th Dec 1864
